titleInfo.title: Interior of Phil Brown's Kosher Butcher Shop

physicalDescription.extent: 2 items (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: " # 70 Phil Brown's Kosher Butcher Shop, C 1921." Handwritten on the back of on photograph: "#70, Phil Brown Kosher, Butcher Shop, circa 1921, Phil Brown behind counter, Mrs. Julia Brown." Handwritten on the back of the other photograph: "printers instruction, #70, Phil Brown's Kosher meat [crossed out] Butcher Ship, 1921, #70, Salimans - Bar & Grill [crossed out]."

mods.abstract: Phil Brown in white apron and hat, stands behind meat counter, with a customer in front of the counter. Bare light bulbs, stools in front of the counter and saw hanging on back wall are part of the interior. Phil Brown was a kosher butcher in Denver.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
